annotations:
Gdday,
pls offer firm for our very close lady
OUR C/P
MV Florencia | open Onsan | 02 - 07 Sept.
39,972 DWT - BOX
BLT 2023 JAPAN
CLASS NK / Malta FLAG
GRAIN/BALE 48,358.24/47,116.74 M3
HO/HA 5/5
CRANES 30.7 T X 4
MAX OUTREACH OF CRANES 10.0 m
LOA/LBP/B/D 182.27/179.95/31.0/14.7 m M Summer Draft 10.346 m mtrs
G/N   25.015 / 12.488
Tropical fresh DWAT 41060 mt/draft 10,796 mtrs - Freeboard 4,187 m
DWAT Fresh water 39971 / draft 10,581 mtrs - FreeBoard 4.472 m
Tropical DWAT 41060 /draft 10,561 mtrs - FreeBoard 4,207 m
Summer DWAT 39972 / draft 10,346 mts - FreeBoard 4,422m
Winter DWAT 38861 mt / draft 10,131 mtrs - FreeBoard 4,637
HATCH OPENING SIZE: NO.1 16.00mX19.20m, NO.2-5 20.80mX25.40m
TT STRENGTH 20 mt /M2
All cargo holds electric Ventilated @ 6 air changes per hour basis empty
hold Australian ladders fitted / ITF fitted
SPEED/CONSUMPTION:
AT SEA: LADEN    ABT 13 KNOTS ON 18 MT(IFO380) + 0.10 MT MDO  OR
BALLAST  ABT 13 KNOTS ON 18 MT(IFO380)  + 0.10 MT MDO
VSL'S SPEED CONSUMPTION BASED ON GOOD WEATHER/CALM SEA MAX BEAUFORT 4 /
DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 AND NO ADVERSE CURRENT WITHOUT GUARANTEE
IN PORT: IDLE    ABT 2.7 MT(IFO380) + 0.10 MT MDO
WORKING ABT 4.00 MT(IFO380) + 0.10 MT MDO WITHIN ISO 8217:2020 RMG380
ADA
Best regards/Elina Psilla
